title: LoL client wont open
body: So i was playing the other night and the next morning i tried to open lol client and the badge came up like normal and then went away and came back but with this grey bar under it ive already done things like delete files from rads uninstalling and reinstalling and allow acess from fire wall turned fire wall off uninstalled anti virus and also ran as admin i even turnes off windows defender but nothing helps it please someone help its been 4 days i even restored my pc didnt help and did all the above with the resored pc it works on my brother computer but not mine

replies.body: Try starting the lol client as administrator. Works for me.

If nothing happens after selecting the launcher, then a security or OS setting may be blocking it from opening. I know you've done some troubleshooting already, but I also recommend going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure all possibilities are ruled out!  You're on the right track!
